course_description: Students will learn the basic principles and general framework of U.S. International Taxation. This course will include a general overview of key statutory provisions, treasury regulations, and tax treaties applicable to domestic and foreign entities and individuals.
sections: Class Nbr: 5719, Section #: 001, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 6:15-7:45p, Instructor: J. Johnson, Status: Open
